content.rendered:
Directed by K.V. Anand

Written by Pattukottai Prabhakar. K.V. Anand. Pattukottai Prabhakar. Pattukottai Prabhakar

Cast Sayyeshaa Saigal (Anjali). Suriya (Kathir). Arya (Abishek Chandrakanth Varma). Mohanlal (PM Chandrakanth Varma). Ben Perl (Villain). Boman Irani (Mahadev). Samuthirakani (Joseph). Chirag Jani (Ranjith Kumar). Shamna Kasim (Priya Joseph). Thalaivasal Vijay (Santhosh). Prem Kumar (Prem (as Prem)). Uma Pathmanabhan (Chandrakanth Varma’s Wife). Sujatha Sivakumar (Kathir’s Mother (as Sujatha)). Ravi Prakash (Mahadev’s Assistant). D.R.K. Kiran (Vivek). Shankar Krishnamurthy (Sundhar). Swaminathan (Ramanujam). Cheranraj (Police Inspector). Nagineedu (Sikander). Anitha (Agri Reporter Megha). M.S. Prabhu (Special Appearance). Anthony (Special Appearance). Nikitha Harris (Special Appearance). T.M. Mavalavan (Farmer). Manoj Anand (Businessman). Kay Aujla (Diplomat). Joy Badlani (IPS Officer). Kishore Bhatt (Vijay Mathur). Dilyana Bouklieva (Police Officer). Darryl Bradford (Mr. Beard The Club Hipster). Gursharan Chaggar (Sikh Indian VIP Guest). Ren Vassilliou (Diplomat). Ferroz Fernandez (London Resident). Naman Gupta (Dinner Guest). Danielle Haden (Dancer). Melissa Hartzel (Police Commissioner). Minouche Kaftel (Foreign Secretary’s Wife). Rani Kaur (Diplomat). Pooja Kimaya (Air India Strewardess / Indian VIP Guest). Dimple Kumar (Indian VIP Guest – Mahadev’s Friend). Swaylee Loughnane (DCI Harvey). Manoj Lulla (Manoj). Mayilsamy (Police inspector). Bharat Mistri (Air India Pilot). Navdeep Monga (Indian VIP Guest). Raju Muthuswamy (Police Agent). Katia Novitskaya-Kalai (Journalist). Shaid Parvaz (Bodyguard / Office Worker). Chirag N. Patel (Indian High Commissioner). Karl-Martin Rantapelkonen (Marine soldier). Anitha Sampath (Newsreader Kavitha (as Anitha Sambath)). Mohan (Special appearance as Kuldeep). Pattukottai Prabhakar (Special appearance as a journalist). Arevinth V Sarma (Surjeeth). Amrita Sharma (Air India Strewardess). Atul Sharma (Air India Pilot). Vinita Sharma (Diplomat / Indian VIP Guest). Sugenthee Sundram (Diplomat). Mike Parish (Diplomat). David Warren (Police Constable Warren). Chris Wilson (Foreign Secretary). Rina Yadav (Indian VIP Guest). R.N.R. Manohar (Member of Parliament). Aastha Agarwal. Amutha. Vikram Chakravarthy. Chelladurai. Robin Das. Kiran Dev. Manoj Dileepan. Gokul. Ajith Koshy. Gautam Kurup. Mani. Abhinaya Melusub ((as Abinaya)). Prathibha Nandakumar. Thangamani Prabhu. Shantha Ram. Ramesh. Durai Ramesh. Rail Ravi. Din Sha. Satish Sharma (Satish Sharma). Shubathra. Sohail. Suganya. Swetha. Atul Tiwari. Dubai Venkat. K. Venkatesan. Gowry Vishvanathan

Languages Tamil. Telugu

Producers KS Jairam. Ravi Sarin. A. Subaskaran

Production Lyca Production. Lyca Production
